extendedInfo.description: Do You Remember? is a pairs like concentration game using real world photography images. Simple gameplay with autosave functionality to play it anytime and anywhere. Easy-peasy control: "Memorize - Press Start - Find the image - Press Stop".  The gallery:  * People theme: Women and men with smiling faces from all over the world: Africa, Asia, Europe, North America, South America, ...  * Zen and Wellness theme: Yoga, Massage, Utensils like stones, salt and towels, Fruits  * Chocolate theme: delicious confectionary - black and white chocolate, brittle, nuts, â¦The music - different themed loops and jingles: Country and Western, Funk, Gospel, House, Rock, Tribal, ... The gallery is filled with 35 high definition images. Whilst you can play through the trial version with 35 images quite fast ... yes you can ... the gallery of the full version (100 images) will be really challenging!If you have any questions, enhancement requests, problems or thoughts please contact us. We'd like to hear from you.Have fun!
